full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS RJE SPRUL SKU RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN GYI BRTAN BZHUGS GSOL 'DEBS DGE LEGS DPAL STER ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES BSTAN 'GRO'I DPAL MGON DAM PAR GYUR BA MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE CHOS KYI RJE BLO BZANG @004A *, ,DPAL LDAN MTSAN CAN GYI BRTAN BZHUGS GSOL 'DEBS DGE LEGS DPAL STER ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAM PA GANG GI ZHABS 'BRING BA DZAS SANG BLA MA CHE HUL NANG SO BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN DANG, DGE SLONG TSE RING BZANG PO, DGE SLONG SKAL BZANG GRAGS LDAN, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'OD ZER RNAMS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, SNYOM LAS PA ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG MA GYUR 'GRO KUN BSHES GNYEN DAM PAS RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR @004B GYUR CIG ,)
